Articles.Content:
First Kerbaled Satellite into orbit!

Today sucked, but ended well.

Today I kicked Bob off Kerbal for a stint in the new Science Lab.

Orbit of 5k Ap and 1.5k Pa.

Hes going to be taking important readings about Gravity and Magnetism in preparation for an un-kerbaled orbit of the Mun.

This feels like a big step forward.

Interestingly I managed to get almost exactly the right amount of fuel for the launch. Total guess work. lol.

No explosions, no bits falling off. Very unlike my program so far.

Stage 1: Establish Orbit around Kerbal.

![ksp_7a_zpsv6vnjki9.jpg](http://i1292.photobucket.com/albums/b580/fragglea/ksp_7a_zpsv6vnjki9.jpg)

Stage 2: Pre for Ap burn @ 5k to establish target orbit (and admire the view).

![ksp_7b_zpsyg5kelcy.jpg](http://i1292.photobucket.com/albums/b580/fragglea/ksp_7b_zpsyg5kelcy.jpg)

Stage 3: Confirm orbit trajectory. Detach final stage rocket and apply some RCS thrust to stabilize orbit and escape debris.

(also turn the lights on in the Lab and make a cuppa tea)

![ksp_7c_zps9niqvjj1.jpg](http://i1292.photobucket.com/albums/b580/fragglea/ksp_7c_zps9niqvjj1.jpg)

Bob is not looking too thrilled with his new home.

I dont think anyone told him it was going to be an extended stay.

Poor Bob! Congrats on your station though.

That's a gorgeous skybox you got there. Nice clouds too. Pity I use all my ram on parts. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Nice work my friend! I remember my first orbit - the smile stayed on my face for hours ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

My rig is built for Prepar3d (flight sim) so its got 16 Gig of physical ram, and another 16Gig in a swapdisk on a SSD.

Also running the x64 hack so KSP and memory is not an issue for me.

Experience and general knowledge of the game is. lol

> 
> That's a gorgeous skybox you got there. Nice butts too. Pity I use all my ram on parts. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Ditto. I always forget how beautiful the game actually looks...

And congrats Fraggle, well done! Onward to the Mun!! (or Minmus)

> 
> Ditto. I always forget how beautiful the game actually looks...
> And congrats Fraggle, well done! Onward to the Mun!! (or Minmus)

That's an interesting quote you've got there.
What visual mods do you have? I really like the sky.

> 
> That's an interesting quote you've got there.

Oops! Ya caught me. It's this: [https://github.com/panicsteve/cloud-to-butt](https://github.com/panicsteve/cloud-to-butt)

I've got a lot of these things installed, I just sort of forget about it sometimes...
